text: In general, terrorists use violence, to create a climate of fear in all the population, or in a small group. They do this because they have political or religious motives. In the United States, the following forms are known: * Anti-abortion violence: People who oppose abortion want to get stricter laws that outlaw or limit abortion. * Antisemitism: Violence against Jews and Jewish institutions * Islamic extremism * Environmental terrorism * Attacks on the US government, either by left-wing or right wing groups. * White nationalism, white supremacy, and attacks on other ethnic groups Category:Terrorist attacks in the United States
title: Terrorism in the United States
